TopicTitle: What is this gall dang eyeball icon thing on engines?

Articles.Content: I see this icon on engines and, as far as I can tell, clicking it does nothing. Anyone have any intel on this doodad?

It's used on the fairings to move the fairings away, but those are super unstable at the moment. I assume it's the same for the engines, but because the fairing showing system is not working properly, it's not doing anything.

It's to take a peek under your engine's skirt.

It does work sometimes in the VAB.
